column3: So now, what is this now
Ohh, a hunk of sandwich from last year
It’s the classic struggle between man and— Someone knocked over a lamp
Hey you guys, you know what’s going to be great about the fishing trip this year
When my dad gets me out in the middle of the lake and gives me that, "Joey, what are you doing with your life
I can say, "Well, I’m doing a movie with Charlton Heston dad
What are you doing with your life
You don’t have to stop having fun just because I’m here
Kathy didn’t cheat on all of you
Hey, Joey, I don’t think that you should leave Chandler alone
I mean it’s only been two days since he broke up with Kathy
Maybe you can go fishing next week
Look, there’s nothing I can do for him right now, he’s still in his sweat pants, that’s still Phase One
I’ll be back for Phase Two, I would never miss Phase Two
Gettin’ drunk and going to a strip club
How does going to a strip club help him better
Because there are naked ladies there
Which helps him get to Phase Three, picturing yourself with other women
There are naked ladies there too
Would you give me one minute
So, these will match the jacket you picked out for me last week
You’re about—well uh, this one is large
Okay, two larges coming right up
I-I was wondering, my niece you see is in from London—well Shropshire really but y’know—well she’s about your age I say
Anyway I have tickets for the opera, Die Fledermaus, and I was wondering if you’d like to keep her company this evening
Yes of course, thank you, thank you, thank you so very much
Right, sorry, I’ll be right back
Uhh, actually y’know what, I kinda—I have to take off
But, I was curious; do you have any plans for tonight
I invested in this night-club and it’s opening tonight, would you like to come
I’m gonna get there early, but I’m going to put you on the V
I almost forget the tickets, didn’t I
For you and Emily, tonight, Die Fledermaus
I think you’ll like it, it has two out of the three tenors
Y’know, I can’t believe Kathy did this too me
I really, thought that she was the one
I tell you what, from now on I’m never getting out of this chair, ever
From now on, this chair is the one
You wanna what else is the one
Just take ‘em off and we’ll have some fun
Oh my God, you guys have no idea
Yeah, three days on the lake without a shower
I fell in that big tub of worms at the bait stand
He hasn’t gotten out of that chair in two days
He just needed his pal to come home
All right, uh, I’ve got to go memorise my lines
Me and Charlton Heston bright and early tomorrow morning
Ohh, it’s Joshua invited me to this fancy club opening tonight
Waltham that I would take his niece to this dumb old opera
So… What are you gonna do
I would, but I get my morning sickness in the evening
She wants to spend the night holding my hair back for me
You guys, come on, this is—I have to meet Joshua
This is my one chance for him to see the fun Rachel
Y’know the "Wouldn’t it be great if she was my wife" Rachel
No, Chandler’s still in Phase One, and Joey’s that thing you smell
You want me to take some girl I’ve never met to the opera so you can go to a club and flirt with some guy, hmm, that-that is a toughie
Ohh, she’s looking down the hall
Oh wait, you can’t see people through that little hole, can you
I thought we have moved on
I thought we’ve gotten to a place where we could be happy for each other
I mean was that just me
Thank you, thank you, thank you
There’s been a teeny-teeny change in plans
It turns out that I’m not free tonight
Well, that’s just lovely, isn’t it
I must’ve missed your call, even though I didn’t leave the flat all day
It’s perfectly in keeping with a trip that I’ve already been run down by one of your wiener carts, and been strip-searched at John F
Kennedy Airport, apparently to you people, I look like someone who’s got a balloon full of cocaine stuffed up their bum
Good night, it was very nice to meet you all
Don’t you just love the way they talk
Oh no wait, oh no, the elastic on my underwear busted
I was supposed to be on the set a half an hour ago
I gotta get out of here
Oh wait, Joey, you can’t go like that
Look, I know I feel asleep before I could shower and now I don’t have time
They’re just ten blocks away, if I run, I can make it
Run ten blocks, that’ll help the smell
How did it go with Joshua last night
Well, I didn’t see Joshua last night, but I did punch a girl in the face
The whole night was horrible, it was pouring down rain, and when I got there, there was no Rachel Green on the list, but there was a Rachel Greep
So, did you get to meet her
No, there is no Rachel Greep, but then this other girl overheard us and she was all, "I’m Rachel Greep
" and he let her right in
So you hit her in the face
No, she was already in, but then this big bitch behind me tried to steal my umbrella, so I clocked her
I can’t believe this, all I wanted was a few hours outside of work to see Joshua, so he can go ahead and start falling in love with me
I thought that was just what we called each other
I’m ready to get drunk and see some strippers
Ooh, let me talk to him
It’s my phone and she’s shhing me
He’s with Emily at a Bed and Breakfast in Vermont
Who the hell is Emily— noooo
How—how did end up in Vermont with that awful witch
Maybe, she doesn’t hit him all the time
When we first met her, she was soaking, her feet were wet
I’m telling you when I got her into a dry pair of shoes, she was a totally different person
There’s a deer just outside eating fruit from the orchard
I’ve gotta go, there’s a deer just outside eating fruit from the orchard
He had to go, there’s a deer just outside eating fruit from the orchard
Okay, I’m going to go stand over there
Why do you care so much anyway
All right, y’know what I’m just upset that I’m getting nowhere with Joshua that—y’know what still, you do not meet someone and go flitting off to Vermont
Well, when you first met Barry, you flitted off to Vail
Oh, y’know, would you just for once, not remember every…little…thing
So y’know, uh, when’s he getting back
Y’know, I knew something like this was going to happen
You can’t just go back a phase
You’re thinking about time, you can’t go back in time
Well, look, why don’t you just, why don’t you do your Phase Two strip club thing with us
Yeah, come on, we can be guys
Maybe we want to be guys
You don’t want to be guys, you’d be all hairy and wouldn’t live as long
Y’know you, you just stop being such a wuss and get those off and you come with us and watch naked girls dance around
Calm down, we got time, we’re running a little late
Look at that, Charlton Heston eating a liquorice whip
Yeah, what the hell is that
Y’know, I can see why you think that, but ah, actually, you know who I think it is
Smells like he went on a three day fishing trip and then ate some liquorice
There’s no way he smells, he’s the only one around here with a shower in his dressing room
And uh, which-which room might that be
Okay, I’ve got some Ones, you wanna put them in her panties
Oh, no umm, hi, that-that, you have to put that out, ‘cause I’m pregnant
Well, maybe you and your baby should go to another strip club
Ha-ha, it’s not my baby, ha-ha-ha
Well, I just checked our messages and Joshua didn’t call
I mean you’d think he’d be worried about me not showing up at his club
Ugh, you know what makes it so much worse, Ross is all happy in Vermont
When you get a sec, another round of daiquiris
Remember, a virgin for me please
And don’t let me leave without getting the name of that carpet guy
Y’know what—y’know what, I think I’m just gonna go home and call Kathy
Well, if you think it will help
In a couple of hours I’m gonna get really drunk and wanna call Kathy and you guys are gonna have to stop me
And then after that, I’m gonna get so drunk, I’m gonna wanna call Janice
I think somebody needs another lap dance
Who in the hell are you
I guess you wouldn’t believe me if I said I was Kurt Douglas, huh
Put some pants on kid so I can kick your butt
You see, I’m an actor, Joey Tribbiani, I’m doing a scene with you today, and well, I stink
Yeah-yeah, I’m one of the cops that won’t work with you ‘cause you a lose cannon
Anyway, look, I’m really sorry, but I stink
Every actor at one time or another—opp
Every actor thinks he stinks, even Lawrence Oliver at sometimes thought he stank, Bob Redford won’t even watch himself
I don’t know one actor worth his salt that didn’t say at one time or another, "God, I stink
" Hell, I just did a scene out there, first take, I stunk the place up
But, the important thing you must remember, no matter how badly you think you might stink, you must never, ever bust into my dressing room and use my shower
So, we did okay at the strip club, right
Thanks to you, the hottest cocktail waitress there is quitting to teach the third grade
All right, well I’m gonna put my sweats back on
Okay, y’know what, you were right, you were right
We really weren’t great at being guys, but you know why
And do you know what girls are really good at
Y’know, maybe it would just really, really help if you would just talk
What’s going in on in there
And y’know, if you wanna cry, that’s okay too
Okay, look, I’m gonna have to ask you all to leave
We tried, but Phase Three is a lost cause, Okay
Those strippers were insanely hot, and I couldn’t picture myself with any of them
They really were pretty, weren’t they
Yeah, I really liked that fighter pilot one
Y’know, I think if I were going to be with a woman
It’d, it’d be with someone like Michelle, she was so oh, she was so petite
See, I don’t know, for me it would have to Chantal
Oh my goodness, she had the smoothest skin
I mean when I stuck that dollar bill in her g-string and grazed her thigh…
I am totally picturing you with all those women
I think I just moved on to Phase Four
Where I don’t want to have a relationship ever
I just want to have sex with strippers and my friends
Come on, let me see that smile
I wanted to go to the strip club
I know, I know, but you’re gonna have plenty of chances
There are literally thousands of women out there just waiting to screw me over
I mean there-there are no words to describe it, I mean the whole weekend was like a dream
Uh, what you said, about us being in a place where we could finally be happy for each other
I mean, I, I-I admit I-I wasn’t quite there
Y’know, I mean the thought of you and that-that Josh guy…
Joshua…guy at that club, dancing and having a good time, the thought of it kinda…y’know
Yeah, and-and thank you for Emily
I’m so glad I could help
All right ladies, here’s what we’re gonna do
You are gonna take off my clothes
You two, go get the oils
And you just constantly scream at the top of your voice, "Chandler’s the king
I-I wanna be with her,  I like her
Go with your instincts, go with your instincts
Wait, now, what am I doing again
Would you please pay attention, I could wake up at any moment
Hi, I’m Joshua, I’m here to pick up Rachel
What do you want from me, I’ve never met the guy
So anyway, Rachel, I’m sorry you can’t stay,  but the rest of us have a lot of work to do
All right, listen, I’ve got to wake up
